abstract: Since taking over as chief executive, Brian Moynihan has stabilized Bank of America, but he is still grappling with his predecessors’ acquisitions, like that of Countrywide.
snippet: Since taking over as chief executive, Brian Moynihan has stabilized Bank of America, but he is still grappling with his predecessors’ acquisitions, like that of Countrywide.
lead_paragraph: Brian Moynihan isn’t one to look back. And as the chief executive of Bank of America, he has plenty of reasons not to, Nelson D. Schwartz reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: Batting Cleanup at Bank of America

abstract: Robert F. Masella is joining the law firm’s mergers and acquisitions practice.
snippet: Robert F. Masella is joining the law firm’s mergers and acquisitions practice.
lead_paragraph: A former investment banker at Bank of America Merrill Lynch is joining the law firm Clifford Chance as a partner.
